segments.text: I notice the details in this drawing of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is facing away, polishing her plate intently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet runs steadily, causing the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, it hits me how unaware she is of the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is almost tipping over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching right into the cookie jar with focus.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands below, hand outstretched expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden through the window is neatly trimmed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back, letting in natural light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are piled neatly on the counter's edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But look, the stool's legs are splayed out unevenly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle widens slowly across the floor tiles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic setup of routine versus chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the contrast with the outside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR
